R

readSourceFile(File) - Method in class de.iisys.mmis.rssServer.RSSThread
The method "readSourceFile" reads a source file from the directory specified by "sourcedir" and generates a single RSSTask from this file.
readSubscription(File) - Method in class de.iisys.mmis.rssServer.RSSThread
The method "readSubscription" reads a subscription file from the directory specified by "sourcedir" and generates a single RSSSubscription from this file.
remTask(URL) - Method in class de.iisys.mmis.rssServer.RSSThread
This method removes an RSSTask from the server.
resetElapsed() - Method in class de.iisys.mmis.rssServer.RSSTask
 
RSSParser - Class in de.iisys.mmis.rssparser
The class RSSParser reads XML files from RSS Feeds, extracts the content of these files and store this content as objects of class Channel.
RSSParser(ServerLogfile, ServerLogfile) - Constructor for class de.iisys.mmis.rssparser.RSSParser
The constructor registers the two logfiles for errors and messages and initializes a document builder for parsing XML files;
RSSPattern - Class in de.iisys.mmis.rssServer
An RSSPattern provides conditions for a subscription.
RSSPattern() - Constructor for class de.iisys.mmis.rssServer.RSSPattern
 
RSSSubscription - Class in de.iisys.mmis.rssServer
The class RSSSubscription represents a subscription of a user of the archive.
RSSSubscription(String) - Constructor for class de.iisys.mmis.rssServer.RSSSubscription
 
RSSTask - Class in de.iisys.mmis.rssServer
This class defines a task for the RSS server.
RSSTask(URL, String, String, int) - Constructor for class de.iisys.mmis.rssServer.RSSTask
 
RSSThread - Class in de.iisys.mmis.rssServer
The class RSSThread is the top level class of the RSS server.
RSSThread(int) - Constructor for class de.iisys.mmis.rssServer.RSSThread
This constructor sets the sleep time for the run method and registers two monitors for the sources and the subscriptions directory.
run() - Method in class de.iisys.mmis.rssframe.DirectoryMonitor
 
run() - Method in class de.iisys.mmis.rssServer.RSSThread
This is the method "run" for the RSS server thread.
